entry.title: Welcome to White Noise
entry.content:
Welcome to White Noise - Chitose Yono Offical Blog! The website is still in constructing and after a while you can enjoy my articles here.

A lot to develop

  • Original background images for changing
  • The font of the title of ariticle and blog
  • Navigator for articles
  • Music bar
  • so on…

About Me

Chitose Yono

    An undergraduate majoring in Software Programing. Got a lot of interests including music, art, traveling and so on, so don’t expect such a internal guy will fill the blog with barely programing.

White Noise

    Article in White Noise will be include but not limited to

  • Software programing
  • Music making
  • Vomit machine

Vomit machine

    To talk about the surrounding naraku everyday just like vomitting the shit.
